sentences.en: Backward inland waterways have been improved distinctively.
sentences.cn: 内河航道落后面貌得到了明显改善.

sentences.en: Coffee with coconut milk is rich, mellow and distinctively smooth in taste.
sentences.cn: 椰奶咖啡味浓 、 香醇、特别柔和.

sentences.en: Distinctively elegant, the newest jacket shapes are highly defined and highly wearaBle.
sentences.cn: 与众不同的优雅, 最新式的茄克衫,线条流畅,穿着极其舒适.

sentences.en: Distinctively spicy with aromas like rose petals and grapefruit. Rich and soft.
sentences.cn: 有一种特殊的辛辣味,香味则像玟瑰花瓣和西柚. 味道丰盈,口感却轻柔.

sentences.en: Each room is distinctively decorated with light, bright colors and floral prints.
sentences.cn: 每个房间都以淡雅或鲜艳的颜色和印花图案装饰成独特的风格。

sentences.en: He has a distinctively sinuous way of walking.
sentences.cn: 他走路扭来扭去，很有特点。

sentences.en: His language was natural , unaffected , distinctively vivid, humorous and strongly charming.
sentences.cn: 语言既朴实无华,又鲜明生动, 幽默而富有艺术魅力.

sentences.en: Our car had to be obviously sporty and distinctively styled , with just a dash of nostalgia.
sentences.cn: 我们的车当然要象跑车,车型要别树一帜, 还要有一点怀旧的色彩.

sentences.en: Result: The albumen contents of liver disease cases of different types distinctively different ( P 0.01 ).
sentences.cn: 结果: 不同类型肝病患者两组间血清蛋白电泳各蛋白成份差异具有显著性 ( P0.01 ).

sentences.en: RESULTS: The three periodontal index differed distinctively from those after the treatment.
sentences.cn: 结果: 牙周三项指数术前与术后3月,半年比较均存在差异.

sentences.en: The expression form the contradictions among the people is distinctively different from before the new circumstances.
sentences.cn: 在新形式下,人民内部矛盾的表现形式和特点与过去相比,有很大不同.

sentences.en: The Magic Barrel reflects the author's style most distinctively.
sentences.cn: 作为一部极佳的作品,《魔桶》反映了作者独特的创作风格.

sentences.en: The orchestra had a distinctively warm and mellow sound.
sentences.cn: 这个管弦乐队演奏的特色是声音优美柔和.

sentences.en: This set of brown earth pottery teacup is distinctively chinese.
sentences.cn: 这套紫砂茶杯具有中国特色.

sentences.en: Yes, they are all distinctively Chinese.
sentences.cn: 是的, 是具有中国特色的.

words.tran_cn: 明显的；独特的；清楚的；有区别的
可区别的；辩认得出的；可辨识的
区别；差别；特性；荣誉、勋章
区分；辨别；使杰出，使表现突出
